name: local-history.saveDelay
desc: Controls the delay in seconds after which local-history is saved. To avoid too many history files.

name: local-history.daysLimit
desc: A day number to purge local history. (0: no purge)

name: local-history.dateLocale
desc: Specify locale to use when displaying date

name: local-history.exclude
desc: Files or folder to not save

name: local-history.enabled
desc: Is save in local history enabled (Never=0, Always=1, Limited to workspaceFolder=2)

name: local-history.path
desc: Specify a location for .history folder (null: use workspaceFolder)

name: local-history.treeLocation
desc: Specify a location for tree view: explorer or localHistory
